\subsection{Detailed Description}
Presents a large number of functions for doing things with \hyperlink{class_f_t_p}{F\-T\-P}

string & {\em \$file\-\_\-mode} & mode to use on the local file. use \href{http://www.php.net/manual/en/function.fopen.php}{\tt http\-://www.\-php.\-net/manual/en/function.\-fopen.\-php} for reference \\
\hline
int & {\em \$ftp\-\_\-mode} & The transfer mode. Must be either F\-T\-P\-\_\-\-A\-S\-C\-I\-I or F\-T\-P\-\_\-\-B\-I\-N\-A\-R\-Y. \\
\hline
int & {\em \$resume\-\_\-pos} & The position in the remote file to start downloading from. \\
\hline
bool & {\em \$blocking} & Whether to perform blocking. If F\-A\-L\-S\-E, uploads the file asynchronously, so your program can perform other operations while the file is being uploaded.\\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}

alias for ftp\-\_\-put — Uploads a file to the \hyperlink{class_f_t_p}{F\-T\-P} server also alias for ftp\-\_\-nb\-\_\-put — Stores a file on the \hyperlink{class_f_t_p}{F\-T\-P} server (non-\/blocking)


\begin{DoxyParams}[1]{Parameters}
string & {\em \$remote\-File} & The remote file path. (the destination location) \\
\hline
string & {\em \$local\-File} & The local file path (the file to put) \\
\hline
int & {\em \$mode} & The transfer mode. Must be either F\-T\-P\-\_\-\-A\-S\-C\-I\-I or F\-T\-P\-\_\-\-B\-I\-N\-A\-R\-Y. \\
\hline
int & {\em \$start\-Pos} & The position in the remote file to start uploading to. \\
\hline
bool & {\em \$blocking} & Whether to perform blocking. Setting to F\-A\-L\-S\-E uploads the file asynchronously, so your program can perform other operations while the file is being uploaded.\\
\hline
